name: Steve Alberts
text: We got a pizza here on Monday, November 30th, 2020. The order was delivered very quickly and all, and it was correct; but the damn pizza is nearly raw. Please slow down the oven, which will also reduce the risk of food poisoning as this pizza is a bacteria farm as it is barely cooked!

name: Anthony Rath
text: One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasnâ€™t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.

name: s s
text: The worst pizza hut in Colorado now. You can't go inside to pick up your order. They don't answer the phone when you call once you arrive. They'll mess up your order and not be able to fix it or compensate you for waiting half an hour past â€¦More

name: Sam Smartt
text: They were very nice and quick to bring my food out to me.

name: Tim Wardell
text: This place is falling apart bathrooms are gross

name: Sarah L
text: pizza at this spot - super tasty. It's so savory. Quick, helpful, and friendly service. They have a lot of great reviews for a reason.

name: Tiesha Regine
text: Their stuffed crust is on point! so yummy & delicious! Super fast & really friendly! Def would recommend to everyone!! ðŸ˜‹

name: Lynn DeBrock
text: Good food,  some who answer the phone arent pleasant.

name: Courtney Baker
text: Ordered on the app. It said 20 minutes. My husband went to pick it up and took another 25 min. When I called to let them know he was there for contactless pickup, the phone rang and no answer. I tried numerous times to reach them and no â€¦More

name: Elizabeth Samora
text: waited almost 2 hours for delivery and got nothing.  Store doesn't answer the phone after multiple attempts. will not be ordering from them again. Hopefully I can get a refund at the least.

text: so far I have no problems with my online orders, always correct, and on time and friendly staff

name: A. Northrup
text: It depends on whoâ€™s working- if itâ€™s the good crew youâ€™ll get great food! The employees are always friendly.

name: Marlin Hostetter
text: Went at noon there was very little in the buffet. One partial pizza was out and hardy any salad bar one pan of pasta though. Cold marinara sauce no bread sticks and no dessert bread sticks. Waited over have an hour before more food came â€¦More

name: Angela Farmer
text: This was the best pizza my family and I have had in a long time. Pizza was cooked perfectly, we recievied it still warm. The thin crispy bottom covered with just the right amount of sauce in the middle, the taste of pepperoni and stringy chesse in every bite. Yum

text: Coffee offered but no creamer or sugar. Black coffee only. 12"  1 topping pizza $3.00 More than down the street. Flavor okay for a frozen pizza. Friend done eating, I'm still waiting for my 12" orderd before he started. Recomend you go elsewhere.
